p: However, the Ag + ions (=0.7 × 10 −3 mol/L) and CTAB (=12.5 × 10 −4 mol/L) were added into the red color of extracted rhein-9-anthrone. No SPR band of Ag 0 was observed in the UV–visible spectrum, suggested that alkaline solution of rhein-9-anthrone did not acted as a reducing agent. On the basis of above results and discussion, the mechanism of glycosidic bond of sennoside A hydrolysis is proposed in Scheme 8 under acidic conditions.
